name: Girl Scout's Guide to the Apocalypse
name_original: Girl Scout's Guide to the Apocalypse
description:
Make your way from Los Angeles, CA all the way to the Canadian border, using only Girl Scout's cookies to buy your way through. Navigate through city landmarks and trade your cookies for important resources like water and electricity.

Made for CMPM 80K: Foundations of Video Game Design at UCSC, Winter 2019.
